title: After charging, the notification bar/swiping down/ lock screen doesn't work properly
content:
In the last week or so, after a full charge (usually overnight), I've noticed that the phone doesn't display the clock or battery (basically the top info has disappeared), and if I try to swipe down to show the notification bar, the screen goes black. 
I then have to press the power button several times to get it to unlock (the unlock screen never shows).
Once unlocked, the same problem. I can swipe up, open apps, side swipe etc. Just swiping down seems to break it.

The only way to fix it is to restart the phone.
Hopefully I'm not the only one?
